00036   /*********************************************************************************/
00037   void TBTrackWriteEngine::registerParameters()
00038   {
00039     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(_engineName+"_colNameX",
00040                                                    "name of collection containing x track coordinates",
00041                                                    _colXName,
00042                                                    string("TBTrackFEX") );
00043 
00044     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(_engineName+"_colNameY",
00045                                                    "name of collection containing y track coordinates",
00046                                                    _colYName,
00047                                                    string("TBTrackFEY") );
00048 
00049    _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(_engineName+"_HcalZ",
00050                                                   "Z coordinate of Hcal front face",
00051                                                   _z_of_Hcal, float(1716));
00052 
00053    _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(_engineName+"_rotationAngle",
00054                                                   "rotation angle along z-axis",
00055                                                   _rotationAngle, float(0.));
00056 
00057   }

00063   /*********************************************************************************/
00064   void TBTrackWriteEngine::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00065   {
00066     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_XSlope",       &_hitsFill.XSlope,       "XSlope/F");
00067     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_XSlopeError",  &_hitsFill.XSlopeError,  "XSlopeError/F");
00068     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_XOffset",      &_hitsFill.XOffset,      "XOffset/F");
00069     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_XOffsetError", &_hitsFill.XOffsetError, "XOffsetError/F");
00070     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_XChi2",        &_hitsFill.XChi2      ,  "XChi2/F");
00071     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_XHcalImpact",  &_hitsFill.XHcalImpact,  "XHcalImpact/F");
00072     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_XNoDof",       &_hitsFill.XNoDof,       "XNoDof/I");
00073     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_XNoHits",      &_hitsFill.XNoHits,      "XNoHits/I");
00074     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_XNumElements", &_hitsFill.XNumElements, "XNumElements/I");
00075     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_XProbability", &_hitsFill.XProbability, "XProbability/F");
00076 
00077     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_YSlope",       &_hitsFill.YSlope,       "YSlope/F");
00078     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_YSlopeError",  &_hitsFill.YSlopeError,  "YSlopeError/F");
00079     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_YOffset",      &_hitsFill.YOffset,      "YOffset/F");
00080     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_YOffsetError", &_hitsFill.YOffsetError, "YOffsetError/F");
00081     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_YChi2",        &_hitsFill.YChi2      ,  "YChi2/F");
00082     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_YHcalImpact",  &_hitsFill.YHcalImpact,  "YHcalImpact/F");
00083     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_YNoDof",       &_hitsFill.YNoDof,       "YNoDof/I");
00084     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_YNoHits",      &_hitsFill.YNoHits,      "YNoHits/I");
00085     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_YNumElements", &_hitsFill.YNumElements, "YNumElements/I");
00086     hostTree->Branch("TBTrack_YProbability", &_hitsFill.YProbability, "YProbability/F");
00087 
00088   }

00094   /*********************************************************************************/
00095   void TBTrackWriteEngine::fillVariables( EVENT::LCEvent* evt ) 
00096   {
00097     _hitsFill.XSlope       = -10000;
00098     _hitsFill.XSlopeError  = -10000;
00099     _hitsFill.XOffset      = -10000;
00100     _hitsFill.XOffsetError = -10000;
00101     _hitsFill.XChi2        = -10000;
00102     _hitsFill.XHcalImpact  = -10000;
00103     _hitsFill.XNoDof       = -10000;
00104     _hitsFill.XNoHits      = 10000;
00105     _hitsFill.XProbability = -10000;
00106 
00107     _hitsFill.YSlope       = -10000;
00108     _hitsFill.YSlopeError  = -10000;
00109     _hitsFill.YOffset      = -10000;
00110     _hitsFill.YOffsetError = -10000;
00111     _hitsFill.YChi2        = -10000;
00112     _hitsFill.YHcalImpact  = -10000;
00113     _hitsFill.YNoDof       = -10000;
00114     _hitsFill.YNoHits      = 10000;
00115     _hitsFill.YProbability = -10000;
00116 
00117 
00118     const TriggerBits trigBits(evt->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_TRIGGER_EVENT));
00119 
00120 //     if (trigBits.isBeamTrigger())
00121 //       {
00122         try
00123           {
00124             /*------------------ x track -----------------------------*/
00125             /* F is sensible, E is your choice, X is the use case*/
00126             LCCollection* colX = evt->getCollection( "TBTrackFEX" );
00127             int noElemX = colX->getNumberOfElements();
00128 
00129             /*if there are several tracks, choose the one with the best probability*/
00130             TBTrack::TrackProjection *trkX = NULL;
00131 
00132             if ( noElemX > 0 )
00133               {
00134                 for (int iX = 0; iX < noElemX; ++iX)
00135                   {
00136                     TBTrack::TrackProjection *currentTrkX = 
00137                       new TBTrack::TrackProjection(dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(colX->getElementAt(iX)) );
00138 
00139                     if (trkX == NULL)
00140                       {
00141                         trkX = currentTrkX;
00142                       }
00143                     else
00144                       {
00145                         if (currentTrkX->probability() > trkX->probability())
00146                           {
00147                             delete trkX;
00148                             trkX = currentTrkX;
00149                           }
00150                         else
00151                           {
00152                             delete currentTrkX;
00153                           }
00154                       }
00155                   }/*end of loop over iX*/
00156 
00157 
00158                 _hitsFill.XSlope       = trkX->gradient(0.);
00159                 _hitsFill.XSlopeError  = trkX->gradientError(0.);
00160                 _hitsFill.XOffset      = trkX->intercept(0., _rotationAngle);
00161                 _hitsFill.XOffsetError = trkX->interceptError(0., _rotationAngle);
00162                 _hitsFill.XChi2        = trkX->chiSquared();
00163                 _hitsFill.XHcalImpact  = trkX->intercept( _z_of_Hcal, _rotationAngle );
00164                 _hitsFill.XNoDof       = trkX->numberOfDof();
00165                 _hitsFill.XNoHits      = trkX->numberOfHits();
00166                 _hitsFill.XNumElements = noElemX;
00167                 _hitsFill.XProbability = trkX->probability();
00168 
00169               }
00170 
00171             
00172             /*------------------ y track -----------------------------*/
00173             /* F is sensible, E is your choice, Y is the use case*/
00174             LCCollection* colY = evt->getCollection( "TBTrackFEY" );
00175             int noElemY = colY->getNumberOfElements();
00176 
00177             /*if there are several track, choose the one with the best probability*/
00178             TBTrack::TrackProjection *trkY = NULL;
00179 
00180             if ( noElemY > 0 )
00181               {
00182                 for (int iY = 0; iY < noElemY; ++iY)
00183                   {
00184                     TBTrack::TrackProjection *currentTrkY = 
00185                       new TBTrack::TrackProjection(dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(colY->getElementAt(iY)) );
00186 
00187                     if (trkY == NULL)
00188                       {
00189                         trkY = currentTrkY;
00190                       }
00191                     else
00192                       {
00193                         if (currentTrkY->probability() > trkY->probability())
00194                           {
00195                             delete trkY;
00196                             trkY = currentTrkY;
00197                           }
00198                         else
00199                           {
00200                             delete currentTrkY;
00201                           }
00202                       }
00203                   }/*end of loop over iY*/
00204 
00205 
00206                 _hitsFill.YSlope       = trkY->gradient(0.);
00207                 _hitsFill.YSlopeError  = trkY->gradientError(0.);
00208                 _hitsFill.YOffset      = trkY->intercept(0., _rotationAngle);
00209                 _hitsFill.YOffsetError = trkY->interceptError(0., _rotationAngle);
00210                 _hitsFill.YChi2        = trkY->chiSquared();
00211                 _hitsFill.YHcalImpact  = trkY->intercept( _z_of_Hcal, _rotationAngle );
00212                 _hitsFill.YNoDof       = trkY->numberOfDof();
00213                 _hitsFill.YNoHits      = trkY->numberOfHits();
00214                 _hitsFill.YNumElements = noElemY;
00215                 _hitsFill.YProbability = trkY->probability();
00216               }
00217             
00218             /*----------------------------------------------------------*/
00219           }
00220         
00221         catch ( DataNotAvailableException err )
00222           {
00223 //          cout <<  "WARNING: Collection "<< _colXName<<" or "<<_colYName
00224 //               << " not available in event "<< evt->getEventNumber() << endl;
00225           }
00226       }
00227     
00228 //   }
00229
